title: Veg Fried Rice
name: Veg Fried Rice
description: Aromatic and flavorful vegetable fried rice prepared with basmati rice, fresh mixed vegetables, and Indo-Chinese spices. A popular street food dish that's both filling and delicious, perfect for lunch or dinner.

title: veg Fried Momos
